name: postmark
description: Ridiculously Simple Email Sending From Node.js For http://www.postmarkapp.com

scripts.compile-docs: echo 'Generating docs...' && mkdir -p ./docs && rm -r ./docs && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc -u ./tutorials -R README.md -c jsdoc.conf.json -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -d docs ./lib/postmark/*.js && cp ./tutorials/postmark-logo.png ./docs && git add -A ./docs && echo 'Generated docs!'
scripts.pull-docs: git subtree pull --prefix docs origin gh-pages
scripts.push-docs: git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages
